name: atom-linter-phpstan
description: Lint PHP on the fly, using phpstan

executablePath.description: Enter the path to your phpstan executable.

autoExecutableSearch.title: Search for executables
autoExecutableSearch.description: Automatically search for `vendor/bin/phpstan` executable. Overrides the executable defined above.

disableWhenNoConfigFile.description: Disable the linter when the config file is not found.

autoConfigSearch.title: Search for config files
autoConfigSearch.description: Automatically search for any `phpstan.neon` or `phpstan.neon.dist` file to use as config. Overrides custom config defined above.

autoAutoloadSearch.title: Search for autoload files
autoAutoloadSearch.description: Automatically search for a `vendor/autoload.php` file to use as autoload. Overrides custom config defined above.

level.description: Level of rule options - the higher the stricter
